movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A skilled thief enters people's dreams to steal valuable information but is given a task to plant an idea instead.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman faces a chaotic criminal mastermind known as the Joker, who pushes Gotham City into turmoil.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of various characters, including two hitmen, a mob boss, and a boxer, intertwine in this nonlinear narrative.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: A banker is sentenced to life in Shawshank State Penitentiary, where he forms an unlikely friendship with a fellow inmate.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club with a soap salesman, leading to a spiral of chaos.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker discovers the true nature of reality and joins a rebellion against sentient machines.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: A simple-minded man recounts his remarkable life journey, which intersects with significant historical events.

movies.title: Goodfellas
movies.description: A young man climbs the ranks of the mob under the guidance of a psychopathic mentor.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A hobbit, along with a fellowship of diverse beings, embarks on a quest to destroy a powerful ring and save Middle-earth.

genres.title: Thriller
genres.description: Thriller movies often involve suspenseful and exciting plotlines that keep the audience on the edge of their seats.

genres.title: Sci-Fi
genres.description: Sci-Fi movies explore imaginative concepts and futuristic settings, often involving advanced science and technology.

genres.title: Fantasy
genres.description: Fantasy movies take audiences into magical or supernatural realms, featuring elements like mythical creatures and epic quests.

genres.title: Mystery
genres.description: Mystery movies involve puzzles, enigmas, and suspenseful elements, where characters unravel secrets or solve crimes.

genres.title: War
genres.description: War movies depict conflicts and battles, often exploring the impact of war on individuals and societies.

genres.title: Action
genres.description: Action movies are packed with thrilling stunts, intense sequences, and heroic characters engaged in high-octane adventures.

genres.title: Comedy
genres.description: Comedy movies aim to entertain and amuse through humor and lighthearted storytelling.

genres.title: Crime
genres.description: Crime movies revolve around criminal activities, investigations, and the world of organized crime. They often depict heists, robberies, murder mysteries, detective work, and the pursuit of justice.

genres.title: Adventure
genres.description: Adventure movies take audiences on thrilling journeys and epic quests.
